item.description:
Hi all,

Here's a sprint triathlon (1/2 Mile Swim, 12.3 Mile Bike, 4.4 Mile Run) that I just signed up for. It's in Sharon which is only 25 miles from Boston. If you're interested, please register using the offical link below and RSVP on the group site so we know who is coming. Depending on the participation, we can do a group brunch after the race as well.

PS. It's a lake so hopefully you shouldn't need a wetsuit.

-Fuat

Race Website:
http://www.maxperform...

Registration:
https://www.signmeup....
item.name: Sharon's Back Triathlon
